Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: World's Most Powerful Microscope, Super Laser and the Northern Lights
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Nanosciene has a miraculous new microscope, the most powerful in the world. And, scientists are planning to use the largest laser beam in the world to shoot tremendous bursts of energy to recreate fusion. And Alaska's Northern Lights are one of the world's greatest natural mysteries.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Autism: Searching for Causes, Home Genetic Testing and Forensic Anthropology
Clip.EpisodeSummary: To learn more about autismn, scientists are looking not only at genes, but also a host of lifestyle and environmental factors. And, what if you could learn your odds of getting a disease? Home genetic testing kits allows anybody to do so. And, meet a forensic anthropologist who's developed a novel technique to help identify the remains of migrants who die crossing the U.S.-Mexico border.

Clip.Title: THE BRAIN THAT CHANGES ITSELF
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Based on the best-selling book by Toronto psychiatrist and researcher Dr. Norman Doidge, a look at how we view the human mind.

Clip.Title: CHANGING YOUR MIND
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Leading-edge research into the problems of the complex human mind, a follow-up documentary to "The Brain that Changes Itself".

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the highlands of the Americas to the world-famous tidal flats of the Bay of Fundy, this exploration of Nova Scotia reveals some of the world's best-kept secrets - here, on the edge of Canada.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From St. John's heading north, the Newfoundland coastline is a maze of iconic bays and inlets - from world-famous Fogo Island, to the abandoned fishing settlements along the island's Northern peninsula.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: At the eastern tip of Papua New Guinea lies a marine paradise made up of 600 remote islands. These distant islands far offshore are surrounded by countless pristine coral reefs. Just beneath the sea - life abounds. With over 1,500 species of fish...every single nook and cranny on the reefs are inhabited and exploited.

Clip.Title: NATURE'S DIVE BOMBERS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Along the South African Coast, the Cape Gannet colonies feast on the East Coast, while those on the West Coast starve and struggle to survive due to commercial fishing.

Clip.Title: CHEETAH: PRICE OF SPEED
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The cheetah excels at acceleration and can run down high-speed prey faster than any mammal on Earth, but its quickness comes at a cost. Hunting means leaving cubs unattended and vulnerable to other predators of the Serengeti. The race for survival is on.

Clip.Title: AERIAL FRANCE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get an up close look at the beautiful French landscape from above and a taste of the rich culture on the stunning coasts.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Being L.A.'s "vintage fashion guru" means that Doris Raymond must maintain the best inventory in the city and she makes sure the whole town knows about her timeless pieces. See how she generates priceless word of mouth when international trendsetter Jason Campbell pays her a visit.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Join the bidding war and discover what it takes to make it in the increasingly competitive world of vintage fashion. Follow Doris, along with her store manager Sarah and fashion consultant Kyle, as they fly to New York and prepare to bid at the highly competitive Augusta Auction - one of the few auction houses in America that specializes solely in vintage clothing, rare textiles, and costume jewelry. This shopping spree will put Doris and her team to the test.

Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Go behind the scenes and learn about some of the real individuals who were protrayed in Scorsese's 1995 film.

Clip.Title: THE WORLD OF SOUND
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The original "indie" label, Folkways Records took a strikingly different path from the rest of the music industry. Gathering together all sounds - from blues and jazz to folk and gospel - Folkways truly defined where music hits the heartbeat right around the world.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
